typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EventID as integer,
		EventDate as date,
		EventTime as timestamp,
		PenguinWeight as double,
		ColonyID as integer,
		TagID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PenguinEvent
PenguinEvent alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		EventID as integer,
		EventDate as date,
		EventTime as timestamp,
		TagID as integer,
		PenguinWeight as double,
		Direction as integer,
		Change as double,
		ColonyID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[PenguinEventQuery] ON'],
	postSQLs:['SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[PenguinEventQuery] OFF'],
	mapColumn(
		EventID,
		EventDate,
		EventTime,
		PenguinWeight,
		ColonyID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
